snippet: The speech was a sharp departure in tone from some of the earlier presentations at the convention, including chants of “lock her up!” about Hillary Clinton....

byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and JENNIFER STEINHAUER

lead_paragraph: The speech was a sharp departure in tone from some of the earlier presentations at the convention, including chants of “lock her up!” about Hillary Clinton.

headline.main: Introducing Her Father, Ivanka Trump Is Character Witness
